PREFIX.description: Enter Prefix For Commands Use Emojis Also

SUDO.description: Enter Numbers With Country Code Without + Separated With , To Add More Numbers

SPAM_COUNT.description: Enter Number Of Times To Send Spam Message Using .spam Command

STICKER_DATA.description: Enter Your Sticker PackName And Author Name

MODE.description: Enter Your Mode Type public For Public Otherwise Type private

MENTION.description: Enter true For Mention Audio Otherwise Type false

MENTION_DATA.description: Enter Mention Data For Mention Audio

MENTION_AUDIO.description: Enter Audio Urls For Mention Audio

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter Your Heroku App Name Same As Above You Entered

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Enter Your Heroku Account Api Key. Get It From https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

AUTO_BIO.description: If You Want To Set Automatic Bio Type true. Otherwise, Type false

AUTO_REACT.description: If You Want To React Automatically To Messages Type true. Otherwise, Type false

AUTO_READ_MSG.description: If You Want To Read Messages Automatically Type true. Otherwise, Type false

AUTO_STATUS_READ.description: If You Want To View Status Automatically, Type true. Otherwise, Type false
